title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 208: Featuring Elite Army Ranger JB Spisso + Ryan Leslie
description:
On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys change it up a bit and are joined by Elite Army Ranger, JB Spisso who has spent some time training NHL players after his career in the United States Military. JB joins to talk about training the Penguins, his time in the Military, and his new book called "Warrior Leadership". The boys are also joined by Ryan Leslie of Sportsnet in Calgary to talk Flames and more importantly, Doughty vs Tkachuk. The guys wrap up with some NHL news, a gambling corner and some talk about Boston fans being angry at the TD Garden.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
